text: Jaume Collet-Serra (; born 23 March 1974) is a Spanish-American movie director and producer. He is known for directing the horror movies House of Wax (2005), Orphan (2009), and The Shallows (2016). He also directed Unknown (2011), Non- Stop (2014), Run All Night (2015), and The Commuter (2018). He will direct the 2022 DC Extended Universe movie Black Adam. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish movie producers
title: Jaume Collet-Serra
